on_issue_capture.description: When a field has on_issue_capture=true and the answer indicates an issue (boolean=true OR enum=yes OR integer/number>0), the UI expands a sub-form to capture: location, photo(s), and optional notes. The captured data is stored as {field_key}_detail object.
